name: Adam Ries - Wikipediaen.wikipedia.org › wiki › Adam_Ries
description:
Adam Ries (January 17, 1492 – March 30, 1559) was a German mathematician. He is also known by the name Adam Riese.

Died: March 30, 1559; Annaberg
Born: January 17, 1492; Bad Staffelstein
